evidence.text:
Person B: Not yet. I’m tryna submit something for that fuckin’ Berrics contest this month but we don’t have a filmer.
Person B: Yeah, I mean, we had one, but we don’t really kick it with him anymore.

Person B: Wanna put yo’ number in?
Person B: Cool...we’ll hit you up next time. As long as you don’t fuck my girlfriend.

Person B: Oh shi- w’sup.
Person A: Yay!!!!!!
Person B: Bro, quit clipping your toenails in the whip.
Person B: Dude, fuck yeah. That could be like the perfect opener. I can imagine it already. Just fakin’ him out. Boom, ride up, backside flip, BOLTS. Music drops. AHHH! So hyped you got that, Chris.

Person B: Nahh, son. Violence is whack! It’s all love out here.
Person B: Aye, can you send me that clip later?

Person B: Yo Donovan, I’m no expert so maybe I’m wrong here...but I don’t think you can put that in your tape, bro.
Person A: Um......yeah...didn’t you say you were a filmer?
Person A: ...Yooo. You can’t be talking to your mom like that...
